arm_group.description: High-fiber high-protein diet Oral supplement : branched chain aminoacids

brief_summary.textblock:
Malnutrition is a frequent complication in patients with liver cirrhosis. Most patients have
      decreased dietary intake due to ascites, hepatic encephalopathy and pro-inflammatory
      cytokines.

      We hypothesized that branched chain aminoacids can improve nutritional status and delay
      episodes of hepatic encephalopathy

clinical_study.brief_title: Branched Chain Aminoacid Supplementation in Patients With Liver Cirrhosis

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        Ambulatory patients Patients with confirmed diagnose of liver cirrhosis Patients
        classified as Child-Pugh A or Child Pugh B

        Exclusion Criteria:

        Acute or chronic renal failure Pregnancy Overt hepatic encephalopathy

facility.name: Instituto Nacional de Ciencias Médicas y Nutrición "Salvador Zubirán"

clinical_study.official_title: High-fiber High-fiber Diet and Branched Chain Aminoacids. Impact on Nutritional Status and Complications in Patients With Liver Cirrhosis

other_outcome.description: Assessed by bioelectrical impedance vector analysis and mid-arm muscle circumference
